summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Led multiple cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact products used by millions of users.

Mentored 4 junior developers and established code review best practices

Designed and implemented RESTful APIs handling 100K+ requests daily
Collaborated with UX team to improve user engagement by 35%
Integrated third-party payment systems and analytics tools
Developed responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Maintained legacy systems and migrated them to modern tech stack
Participated in agile development process and sprint planning
